Job Title
Data Scientist (Mid- to Senior-Level)
Job Overview
We are seeking an experienced and motivated Data Scientist to leverage large datasets and advanced analytics to drive strategic business decisions. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of developing and deploying robust machine learning models into production environments and communicating complex findings to non-technical stakeholders. This role involves leading analytical projects and contributing to the overall data strategy of the company. 
Taggd
Taggd
 +4
Key Responsibilities
Model Development & Deployment: Design, build, test, and deploy predictive models and machine learning algorithms (e.g., classification, regression, clustering, neural networks, NLP, time series analysis) to solve complex business problems.
Data Analysis & Preparation: Lead data mining and collection procedures, including cleaning, processing, and verifying the integrity of large, complex structured and unstructured datasets from various sources.
Business Collaboration: Partner with cross-functional teams (product, engineering, marketing, sales) to identify opportunities, define problems, and translate data findings into actionable insights that drive business impact.
Experimentation & Validation: Develop and implement A/B testing frameworks and performance monitoring systems to ensure model quality and effectiveness in real-world scenarios.
Communication & Leadership: Create clear, impactful visualizations and present complex analytical results and recommendations to senior leadership and non-technical audiences.
Mentorship & Best Practices: Provide mentorship and guidance to junior data scientists and analysts, fostering a culture of technical excellence and best practices in data science and MLOps. 
Taggd
Taggd
 +6
Required Qualifications and Skills
Experience: 4+ years of professional experience in a data science or advanced analytics role.
Education: Bachelor's or Master's degree in a quantitative field such as Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline.
Programming Languages: Proficiency in statistical programming languages, particularly Python and SQL, with experience using relevant libraries like Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch.
Technical Skills:
Strong knowledge of statistical and machine learning techniques.
Experience with big data frameworks and distributed computing tools (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, Hive).
Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
Experience using data visualization and Business Intelligence (BI) tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Soft Skills:
Strong analytical and problem-solving aptitude.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to tell a story with data.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, agile environment

Job description
SUMMARY
Wissen Technology is hiring for Java Lead- Special Projects

About Wissen Technology:
At Wissen Technology, we deliver niche, custom-built products that solve complex business challenges across industries worldwide. Founded in 2015, our core philosophy is built around a strong product engineering mindset ensuring every solution is architected and delivered right the first time. Today, Wissen Technology has a global footprint with 2000+ employees across offices in the US, UK, UAE, India, and Australia . Our commitment to excellence translates into delivering 2X impact compared to traditional service providers. How do we achieve this? Through a combination of deep domain knowledge, cutting-edge technology expertise, and a relentless focus on quality. We don’t just meet expectations we exceed them by ensuring faster time-to-market, reduced rework, and greater alignment with client objectives. We have a proven track record of building mission-critical systems across industries, including financial services, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, and more. Wissen stands apart through its unique delivery models. Our outcome-based projects ensure predictable costs and timelines, while our agile pods provide clients the flexibility to adapt to their evolving business needs. Wissen leverages its thought leadership and technology prowess to drive superior business outcomes. Our success is powered by top-tier talent.  Our mission is clear: to be the partner of choice for building world-class custom products that deliver exceptional impact the first time, every time.  

 

Job Summary:We are looking for a highly skilled and driven Java Technical Lead with 7 to 10 years of experience in product development, ideally from premier institutes like IITs, NITs, BITS Pilani, IIITs, or other top-tier Engineering colleges in India.  As part of our elite development team, you will be expected to solve complex technical problems, design scalable systems, and deliver high-impact solutions at faster pace. You will also lead Engineers, drive end-to-end project execution, and work closely with clients to convert business needs into practical technical solutions.

 
Experience: 7 - 10 Years
Location: Bengaluru  
Mode of Work: Full Time

Key Responsibilities:

Lead the design, development, testing, and deployment of high-performance Java applications.  
Translate complex client problems into simple, scalable technical solutions.  
Break down business requirements into actionable tasks for the team and drive execution.  
Lead and mentor team members to improve their technical capabilities and development speed.  
Own architectural decisions, design discussions, and ensure high code quality through reviews and best practices.  
Collaborate cross-functionally with other teams to ensure seamless delivery.  
Maintain a strong focus on performance, scalability, and maintainability.  
Continuously explore and implement new technologies to improve development productivity and product quality.  
Required Skills:

7 to 10 years of hands-on Java development experience, including experience in leading small to mid-sized teams and managing technical delivery.  
Strong experience in building complex products/applications and distributed systems from the ground up.  
Solid understanding of OOP principles, Java internals, data structures, algorithms, and design patterns.  
Hands-on experience with Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, and microservices architecture.  
Proven ability to design and deliver high-performance systems with speed and precision.  
Exposure to RESTful APIs, SQL/NoSQL databases, and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).  
Excellent debugging, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills.  
Strong communication and project ownership abilities.  
Preferred Skills:

B.Tech/ M.Tech /MCA from IITs, NITs, BITS Pilani, IIITs, or other top-tier institutions.  
Prior recognitions, awards, or rapid growth within previous organizations is a big plus.  
Proven ability to develop and deliver in fast paced environment without compromising on quality.
